Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: First I should look for events that are related chronologically and in terms of the patient journey Patients would typically come in register get triage then maybe a consultation tests surgery and then discharged But the events are interleaved so I need to see which patients activities are consecutive or in a logical order

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Lets start by looking at each patient individually Each event has patient_age patient_gender and department activity So maybe each patient can be identified by those attributes For example lets list out all events with the same patient details

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Looking at patient_age 45 gender M Event 1 Register in ER Event 12 Doctor consultation in ER Event 15 Discharge from ER Thats a possible case registration triage event4 same patient event4 and event12 both patient_age 45 M in ER So maybe this is one case

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Next patient_age 62 gender F Event2 Register in ER Event5 Triage in ER Event8 Doctor consultation in ER Event10 Lab completed Event11 Doctor consultation Event14 Prescription Event17 Discharge So thats another case

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Patient_age 28 gender M Event3 Register in Surgery Event6 Doctor consultation Event9 Surgery preparation Event13 Surgery Event16 Recovery room Event18 Discharge Thats another case

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait but event7 is Xray for patient_age 45 event7 Xray imaging Then event12 consultation patient_age45 M So maybe another case Hmm but event7 and event12 both same patient But event1 registration same patient event4 triage Then event7 Xray event12 consultation event15 discharge Or is there overlap

Name: Validation - PE
Text: events 1 4 7 12 15 same patient age 45 M one case Then events 2 5 8 10 11 14 17 patient age62 F Then events 3 6 9 13 16 18 patient age 28 M That seems to cover all events So three cases event4 triage patient age45 event1 event7 Xray event12 consultation event15 discharge all same patient

Name: Validation - PE
Text: event16 recovery room patient age28 case3 Event18 discharge same patient So thats correct So the answer should be three cases with these event groups
